name: Wanikani Grayish-Blueish-Dark
description:
Makes your Wanikani a little darker while trying to retain the site's style.
There's still a lot left to tweak, but the gist of it is there.

GitHub: https://github.com/misabiko/Wanikani-Grayish-Blueish-Dark
additional_info:
*Update* 4/19/2016 - Made the header's gradient more subtle

*Update* 4/12/2016 - Chat, API and FAQ now a lot more readable. Added a GitHub repository.

discussions.name: Text colours same as background in some instances
